cast.name: 罗伯特·拉萨多 Robert LaSardo
朱莉·安妮·普雷斯科特 Julie Anne Prescott

this_title: The True Tale of Ole Splitfoot vs. The Lesbian Warrior Nuns of the Great White North
trans_title: 恶魔大战加拿大拉拉修女武士
introduction: Set in a remote Canadian town ,whose only industry is the local maple syrup processing plant, a group of lesbian warrior nuns, posing as strippers, stand guard, vigilant; the last defense against the hordes of Satan. Late one chilly, northern night strip club The Beaver Dam. becomes the final battleground for the forces of good and evil to go head to head as a young mother frantically looks to protect her child from certain damnation.
chinese_title: 恶魔大战加拿大拉拉修女武士
foreign_title: The True Tale of Ole Splitfoot vs. The Lesbian Warrior Nuns of the Great White North
